The Experience of a Lifetime

Immerse yourself in the mysticism of Bali on this gastronomical retreat.

Tresna Bali Culinary and Culture Retreats

Imagine yourself at a luxurious villa – your every need taken care of! Tresna Bali Retreats is a culturally immersive culinary experience reserved for only 12 participants.

On this 6-day retreat, you’ll gain an inside perspective of Bali’s sacred culture through magical experiences, curated personally by our Resident Balinese Holyperson (Priestess), Frances Tse Ardika.

Book Now

Providing you with authentic Balinese experiences.

Frances and Adi have cooked for hundreds of foodies from all over the world, eaten in thousands of roadside warungs as well as created the most decadent wedding feasts with the top Chefs in Bali before building Tresna Bali Cooking School from ground up.

Frances became Bali’s only Holyperson from outside of Bali through a remarkable 6-year process from 2010-2016. For the first time, she’ll share her personal journey with you - from when she first set foot in this Paradise on October 7, 2000.

19 years later, she and Adi manage 5 enterprising small businesses all revolving around their passions of food, culture, healing and spirituality.

Book Now

Behind Bali's Walls

Without a doubt, Bali is beautiful and the Balinese are a loving and peaceful society. However, the majority of Balinese locals have difficulty describing the rich culture behind the walls of their family compounds.

You’ll experience a Bali that is rarely shared with visitors as you learn about Adi and Frances’ devotion to Balinese Temple life and their passionate love affair with the best food on the island,

Even if you have been to Bali 20 times before, with this unique retreat, you’ll experience authentic local flavours, traverse the natural landscape, and embrace what it means to be truly Balinese.

Book Now

Your Accommodation

Located in the charming village of Umalas, near Seminyak, Villa Malaathina – set among 5,000 square metres of immaculate tropical gardens and surrounded by traditional Balinese rice paddies – is your luxurious home for the duration of our 6-day retreat.

As an upmarket travel agent and wedding planner for 15 years in Bali, Frances is intimately familiar with every 5-star resort and villa in Bali. For our retreat, she has selected the very best – enjoy privacy in your luxurious room as well as world class facilities including a 25-metre pool, dedicated yoga studio, media room and several indoor and outdoor spaces to relax. We have a team of Balinese and Canadian cooks, housekeepers and travel coordinators to take care of your every need.

For more information, visit the Villa Malaathina Official Site.

What's Included

  • Culinary and Cultural Talks, led by Resident Holypeople and Chefs: Frances and Adi
  • 5 nights, 6 days 5-Star Boutique Stay at COMO UMA Ubud in a lovely Terrace Room
  • All Meals Included (Beverages are extra charge based on personal consumption)
  • Daily A La Carte Breakfast at COMO Uma Ubud
  • All Lunches: 9-course Balinese Feast that you cook yourself, Babi Guling, Indonesian Rijsttafel
  • All Group Dinners: Welcome Dinner, Balinese Crispy Duck, Jimbaran Beach Seafood BBQ, and Upmarket Modern Asian Street Food
  • Complimentary yoga by COMO Shambhala teachers
  • Morning rice paddy or village walks
  • Spa Pampering – Two times x 75 minutes Balinese Massage
  • Purifying Temple Ceremony and Artisan Village Tour
  • Authentic Hands-On Balinese Cooking Class
  • Private Airport Transfers
  • Transportation to meals and activities

Note: Flight cost not included.
